finding regression coefficients and deviation with autocorrellated outlaws

410.79) x =seq(1:391) Concentration of CO2 in the air depends of season. So if I try to find regression coefficients A and B with use of least squares, y=Bx + A +e vector e of outliers will have autocorreleation . How should I find regression coefficients and coefficients errors?
